comments: Write a discovery consumer that injects discovered JREs/JDKs into the "installed jres" preference page.
*** Bug 195852 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

I changed the implementation of JREINjector.insertJRE() to what I was told by the jdt-core-dev mailing list. Now, the error I get when I click on the Inject menu item is:

(relevant portion)
